This is just a little attribution page for the game. Of course the inspiration for the project is classic \[Diplomacy\](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diplomacy\_(game) by [Allan B. Calhamer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allan_B._Calhamer "Allan B. Calhamer wikipedia article."). The authors of this project, Chicanery, are: Kenny Luong, Adam Sikorski, Tin Skoric, Issac Zheng.
